name: gentype
description: Use Reason values from Javascript: vanilla, or TypeScript/FlowType-annotated

scripts.install:examples: (cd examples/flow-react-example && npm install) & (cd examples/typescript-react-example && npm install) & (cd examples/untyped-react-example && npm install)
scripts.build:examples: (cd examples/flow-react-example && npm run clean && npm run build) & (cd examples/typescript-react-example && npm run clean && npm run build) & (cd examples/untyped-react-example && npm run clean && npm run build)

author: Cristiano Calcagno
